sense.gloss: (the) second (party, rank, etc.), B (grade), the latter
first and second, A and B
superiority and (or) inferiority, distinction (in quality), discernment, discrimination
young female rice planter, young girl
second in rank, second sign of the Chinese calendar
younger brother (of an older brother), younger sister (of an older sister)
second division of the night (approx. 9pm to 11pm)
Oto Hime, Princess of the Dragon Palace (from the story of Urashima Tarō)

x: 甲乙丙・こうおつへい

sense.gloss: to affect a serene mood, to affect a serious demeanor, to act prudishly, to assume an air of superiority
A, B, C and D, first, second, third and fourth
the former and the latter, A and B
difficult to say which of the two is better, hard to tell which is better, (there is) little to choose between them

r_ele.r: こうのくすりはおつのどく

sense.gloss: one man's meat is another man's poison, one man's medicine is another man's poison
mottled spinefoot (Siganus fuscescens, species of Western Pacific rabbitfish), dusky rabbitfish, sandy spinefoot

sdata.j: ↑乙姫↑↓おとひめ↓↑様↑↓さま↓は↑浦島↑↓うらしま↓↑太郎↑↓たろう↓に↑美↑↓うつく↓しい↑玉手箱↑↓たまてばこ↓をくれました。
sdata.e: Lady Otohime gave Urashima Taro a beautiful Tamate-box.

sdata.j: ↑乙女↑↓おとめ↓たちは↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑胸↑↓むね↓をときめかす。
sdata.e: He makes young girls' hearts flutter.

sdata.j: ↑乙↑↓おつ↓が↑受託↑↓じゅたく↓↑業務↑↓ぎょうむ↓の↑実施↑↓じっし↓により↑得↑↓え↓た↑成果↑↓せいか↓は、↑甲乙↑↓こうおつ↓↑双方↑↓そうほう↓に↑帰属↑↓きぞく↓するものとする。
sdata.e: Any result obtained through the execution of the Commissioned Business shall belong to each party hereto.

sdata.j: ↑甲↑↓かぶと↓の↑食物↑↓しょくもつ↓は↑乙↑↓おつ↓の↑毒↑↓どく↓。
sdata.e: One man's meat is another man's poison.

sdata.j: ↑甲↑↓かぶと↓の↑損↑↓そん↓は↑乙↑↓おつ↓の↑得↑↓とく↓。
sdata.e: One man's gain is another man's loss.

sdata.j: ↑甲↑↓こう↓の↑薬↑↓くすり↓は↑乙↑↓おつ↓の↑毒↑↓どく↓。
sdata.e: One man's medicine is another man's poison.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓のしかめた↑顔↑↓かお↓は、↑他↑↓た↓の↑乙女↑↓おとめ↓の↑微笑↑↓ほほえ↓みより↑遥↑↓はる↓かに↑美↑↓うつく↓しい。
sdata.e: Her very frowns are fairer far than smiles of other maidens are.

sdata.j: ベェーだっ！↑乙女↑↓おとめ↓のことを嗤った↑罰↑↓ばっ↓よ！
sdata.e: Pfft! That's what you get for laughing at a girl!

sdata.j: ベェーだっ！↑乙女↑↓おとめ↓のことを嗤った↑罰↑↓ばっ↓よ！
sdata.e: Pfft! That's your punishment for laughing at a girl!

sdata.j: 「お↑前↑↓まえ↓、↑見↑↓み↓かけによらず↑変態↑↓へんたい↓だな」「↑変態↑↓へんたい↓じゃないし。↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑清純↑↓せいじゅん↓↑派↑↓は↓の↑乙女↑↓おとめ↓よ」「はいはい、よく↑言↑↓い↓うよ」
sdata.e: Despite appearances, you're a pervert. "I'm not a pervert. I'm a pure and innocent young girl." "Yeah, yeah, give me a break."

sdata.j: 「どっちの↑訳↑↓やく↓がいいと↑思↑↓おも↓う？」「どっちも↑自然↑↓しぜん↓な↑訳↑↓やく↓で、↑甲乙↑↓こうおつ↓つけがたいね」
sdata.e: Which translation is better? "It's hard to tell, they're both natural translations."

sdata.j: ↑愛↑↓あい↓は↑百↑↓ひゃく↓↑人↑↓にん↓を↑愛↑↓あい↓すれば↑百↑↓ひゃく↓↑分↑↓ふん↓されるような↑量的↑↓りょうてき↓なものではない。↑甲↑↓かぶと↓を↑愛↑↓あい↓しているから、↑乙↑↓おつ↓を↑愛↑↓あい↓されないというのは↑真↑↓しん↓の↑愛↑↓あい↓ではない。
sdata.e: Love is not quantitative. If you love one hundred people, you cannot assign one hundredth of that love to each individual person. To say that you are not able to love one person because you love another is not real love.

sdata.j: ↑黄道↑↓こうどう↓↑十↑↓じゅう↓↑二↑↓に↓↑星座↑↓せいざ↓は↑次↑↓つぎ↓の↑通↑↓とお↓りです：↑牡↑↓お↓↑羊↑↓ひつじ↓↑座↑↓ざ↓・↑牡↑↓お↓↑牛↑↓うし↓↑座↑↓ざ↓・↑双子↑↓ふたご↓↑座↑↓ざ↓・↑蟹↑↓かに↓↑座↑↓ざ↓・↑獅子↑↓しし↓↑座↑↓ざ↓・↑乙女↑↓おとめ↓↑座↑↓ざ↓・↑天秤↑↓てんびん↓↑座↑↓ざ↓・↑蠍↑↓さそり↓↑座↑↓ざ↓・↑射手↑↓いて↓↑座↑↓ざ↓・↑山羊↑↓やぎ↓↑座↑↓ざ↓・↑水瓶座↑↓みずがめざ↓・↑魚↑↓うお↓↑座↑↓ざ↓。
sdata.e: The twelve signs of the Zodiac are: Aries, Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, Leo, Virgo, Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius, Capricorn, Aquarius and Pisces.

sdata.j: ↑花↑↓はな↓も↑恥↑↓は↓じらう↑乙女↑↓おとめ↓たちに↑囲↑↓かこ↓まれ、トムは↑緊張↑↓きんちょう↓を↑隠↑↓かく↓せなかった。
sdata.e: Tom couldn't hide his nervousness at being surrounded by a group of excessively lovely maidens.
